div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre:
68 Peloponnesus ?, c. 1924 Burial: c. - B.C. (T) Contents: 38 AR Thebes: 20 st. (7 as BMC 70-7; as 94; 9 with Boeotarchs; 3 illeg.) ANS 1944.100.20121
Aegina: 14 st. (incl. 1 T-turtle, 1 early tortoise) ANS 1944.100.25261 ANS 1944.100.25239 ANS 1944.100.25240 ANS 1944.100.25237 ANS 1944.100.25266 ANS 1944.100.25238 ANS 1944.100.25265 ANS 1944.100.25259
Sicyon: 2 st. Elis: 1 st. (as Seltman Grp. BS) Thera: 1 st. (dolphins/incuse) Disposition: New York 9 (8 Aegina, 1 Thebes) Newell's record of varieties on file in ANS
